segments.advisor_message: Hey there! So, uh, let’s dive into your health a bit, yeah? Can you tell me how you, like, feel these days? Any major issues or just a general check-in?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, I guess I’m okay, mostly. Just, you know, a bit tired often and I think my, um, back has been hurting sometimes.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! That sounds rough. And, uh, do you smoke or anything like that? I mean, if you don’t mind me asking.
segments.client_message: Yeah, I smoke, like, a pack a day or so, uh, been doing that since I was, like, 18, I think. It’s not the best habit, huh?

segments.advisor_message: Yeah, those habits can be tricky, huh? Now, do you have, like, long-term care needs or anything, or is there, um, a will or power of attorney set up? Just curious.
segments.client_message: Nah, no long-term care needed right now, but actually I don’t have a will or power of attorney, either. Just, um, kinda haven’t thought about it much, you know?
